analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nahetuṁ nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā hetu dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetum na dassanena pahātabbam dhammam paccayā hetu dassanena pahātabbaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nahetuṁ nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā hetu bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetum na bhāvanāya pahātabbam dhammam paccayā hetu bhāvanāya pahātabbaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nahetuṁ nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nevadassanena
analyzed: na hetum na na iva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na iva dassanena

original: nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanahetuṁ nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya
analyzed: na bhāvanāya pahātabbaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na na hetum na na iva dassanena na bhāvanāya

original: pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na iva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati
hetu paccayāḥ duka mūlam ekam sabbattha tīṇi

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
